org.xflatdb.xflat

Class DatabaseBuilder<T extends Database>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.xflatdb.xflat.DatabaseBuilder<T>

  • public class DatabaseBuilder<T extends Database>
extends Object
    A builder which is used to configure the database before initializing it.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  DatabaseBuilder.DatabaseProvider<T extends Database>

    • Method Detail

      • withRequirements

        public DatabaseBuilder<T> withRequirements(Map<String,Object> requirements)
        Adds requirements of the database to be instantiated.
        Parameters:
        requirements - The requirements to use
        Returns:
        A new DatabaseBuilder with the given requirements

      • withRequirements

        public DatabaseBuilder<T> withRequirements(String... requirements)
        Adds requirements of the database to be instantiated. The requirements are given as keys only, their values are assumed to be boolean true.

        This is a convenience for withRequirement(key, true)

        Parameters:
        requirements - The set of requirements which should be "true"
        Returns:
        A new DatabaseBuilder with the given requirements

      • withRequirement

        public DatabaseBuilder<T> withRequirement(String name,
                                 Object value)
        Adds a requirement of the database to be instantiated.
        Parameters:
        name - the named key of the requirement.
        value - the value of the requirement.
        Returns:
        A new DatabaseBuilder with the given requirement

      • withDatabaseConfig

        public DatabaseBuilder<T> withDatabaseConfig(DatabaseConfig config)
        Sets the database configuration to use with the instantiated database. This overwrites any existing configuration.
        Parameters:
        config - The configuration to use.
        Returns:
        A new DatabaseBuilder with the given configuration.

      • withTableConfig

        public DatabaseBuilder<T> withTableConfig(String tableName,
                                 TableConfig config)
        Sets the table configuration to use with a given named table. This overwrites any previous configuration for the given table.
        Parameters:
        tableName - The table to configure.
        config - The configuration for the table.
        Returns:
        A new DatabaseBuilder with the given configuration.

      • create

        public T create()
                          throws XFlatConfigurationException
        Creates a new database with the current configuration. The database must satisfy the current requirements.
        Returns:
        A new instance of a database implementation satisfying the requirements.
        Throws:
        XFlatConfigurationException - if no database could be found satisfying the requirements, or if an error occurred when constructing the database.
